titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that Members who change political parties repay certain funds to the political party from which the change of affiliation was made.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Rules and Organization of the House.

bill.summary: 7/25/1995--Introduced. Amends the Rules of the House of Representatives to add rule LIII to require a Member who changes political party affiliation to pay to the former political party an amount equal to the amount of all contributions received by him or her from that political party with respect to the most recent election of that Member to the House.
